mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no,notice_title, notice_contents, notice_date, notice_category ) values(#{notice_no}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_contents}, sysdate, #{notice_category})
mapper.select:
select notice_no, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_date, notice_category from notice where notice_no > 0
order by notice_no desc, notice_date desc
select notice_no, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_date, notice_category from notice where notice_no = #{notice_no}
select notice_no, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_date, notice_category from notice where rownum >= 3 and rownum <= 15 order by notice_no desc, notice_date desc
select notice_no, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_date, notice_category from notice where rownum > #{pageStart} and rownum <= #{perPageNum} order by notice_no desc, notice_date desc
